lung_cancer.name: Lung Cancer
lung_cancer.treatment: Treatment depends on stage and may include surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, targeted therapy, or immunotherapy. Early detection significantly improves outcomes.
lung_cancer.emergency_action: Seek immediate medical attention if coughing blood or experiencing severe breathing difficulty

breast_cancer.name: Breast Cancer
breast_cancer.treatment: Options include surgery (lumpectomy or mastectomy), chemotherapy, radiation, hormone therapy, and targeted therapy. Treatment is personalized based on cancer type and stage.
breast_cancer.emergency_action: Schedule immediate consultation with breast specialist for proper evaluation and biopsy if needed

colon_cancer.name: Colon Cancer
colon_cancer.treatment: Primary treatment is surgery to remove the tumor. May be combined with chemotherapy and radiation therapy depending on stage.
colon_cancer.emergency_action: Consult gastroenterologist for colonoscopy and proper diagnosis

brain_tumor.name: Brain Tumor
brain_tumor.treatment: Treatment includes surgery, radiation therapy, and chemotherapy. Steroids may be used to reduce swelling.
brain_tumor.emergency_action: Seek immediate medical care for severe headaches, seizures, or sudden vision changes

prostate_cancer.name: Prostate Cancer
prostate_cancer.treatment: Options include active surveillance, surgery, radiation therapy, hormone therapy, and chemotherapy based on cancer aggressiveness and patient age.
prostate_cancer.emergency_action: Schedule consultation with urologist for PSA testing and examination

lymphoma.name: Lymphoma
lymphoma.treatment: Treatment includes chemotherapy, radiation therapy, immunotherapy, and stem cell transplant depending on type and stage.
lymphoma.emergency_action: Consult hematologist for blood tests and lymph node biopsy

skin_cancer.name: Skin Cancer (Melanoma)
skin_cancer.treatment: Early stage: surgical removal. Advanced: immunotherapy, targeted therapy, chemotherapy, or radiation.
skin_cancer.emergency_action: See dermatologist for skin examination and biopsy of suspicious lesions

leukemia.name: Leukemia
leukemia.treatment: Chemotherapy, targeted therapy, radiation, and stem cell transplant. Treatment varies by leukemia type.
leukemia.emergency_action: Seek immediate medical care for unexplained bleeding, severe infections, or high fever

pancreatic_cancer.name: Pancreatic Cancer
pancreatic_cancer.treatment: Surgery (Whipple procedure), chemotherapy, radiation therapy. Often diagnosed at advanced stages.
pancreatic_cancer.emergency_action: Consult gastroenterologist immediately for jaundice or severe abdominal pain

ovarian_cancer.name: Ovarian Cancer
ovarian_cancer.treatment: Surgery to remove tumors followed by chemotherapy. May include targeted therapy.
ovarian_cancer.emergency_action: See gynecologist for pelvic examination and imaging studies
